name: .WLD
summary: Learn about .WLD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To use a WLD file with Re-Logic Terraria (Windows, Mac), place it in your ~/​Terraria/​Worlds directory (the full location of which is noted above). Then, the world your WLD file contains will appear on Terraria's Select World screen.

You can also open WLD files with various third-party Terraria map editors and viewers. For example, TEdit (Windows) allows players to edit the world a WLD file contains. TerraMap (Windows, Web) allows players to view a map of the world a WLD file contains.
